bibl.title: P. Oxy. 744.4 and Colossians 3,9.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty II Supplement (= van Haelst 497; P46). The negated present subjunctive μὴ ψεύδησθε at Col. 3,9 may be the original reading of the text in Egypt and may perhaps reflect the original MS reading. Cf. P. Oxy. IV, 744, 4 (first cent. B.C.): μὴ ᾶγωνιᾷς.
bibl.seg: PORTER Stanley E., P. Oxy. 744.4 and Colossians 3,9.

P. Chester Beatty II Supplement (= van Haelst 497; P46). The negated present subjunctive μὴ ψεύδησθε at Col. 3,9 may be the original reading of the text in Egypt and may perhaps reflect the original MS reading. Cf. P. Oxy. IV, 744, 4 (first cent. B.C.): μὴ ᾶγωνιᾷς.
